citations.narrative:
A complete Record of Animals on Hand was not available at time of inspection. Acquisition records, in particular for
hedgehogs, were also missing. Incomplete records can prevent proper care and welfare of regulated animals on premise.
Correct by updating the Record of Animals on Hand to reflect the current count of regulated animals on premise and by
making acquisition records for newly arrived regulated animals.
Correct by 29 March 2023.

A contingency plan was not available at time of inspection. Contingency plans help prepare facilities on how to provide
humane handling of animals during emergent events. Correct by developing a complete contingency plan tailored to the
facility and regulated animals.
Correct by 29 March 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
End Section
